title: Rap111
author: Rap111
content: https://talkethereum.org Â Required for Forum -- Moderator WantedGrowing Together I Decided to Put the System into Operation

comments.author: digaran
comments.body: How much? Also do you have a trust system where I can conquer the way I did here? I guess since ETH uses the same curve as Bitcoin, I can continue cracking the curve over there. Ok a fair warning, don't click on my profile and don't go to my trust page, accept me the way I am, no judgement.ðŸ˜‰

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: Rap111 on October 24, 2023, 02:34:07 PMRequired for Forum -- Moderator WantedGrowing Together I Decided to Put the System into OperationI assume that it is not a paid position, but you are expecting someone on a volunteer basis.Have you done any analysis at all, how much is needed for another cryptocurrency talk forum? What is the goal you want to achieve with it?Just a few days ago, you were selling this domain, what are the guarantees that you won't sell it in a few months, so someone who volunteered with you just wasted his time.Talkethereum.org domain name for saleQuote from: Rap111 on October 19, 2023, 01:25:11 PMMy Private Domain Name is For Sale You Can Contact Ushttps://t.me/ethereumtalkgroup

comments.author: TheUltraElite
comments.body: What are trying to achieve here mate?You set up the domain as a forum for crypto related stuff and then try to sell it and then when you find no buyers, you try to hire a moderator position for that. I think you are mixing it all up in terms of the sequence of events. You consolidate a domain, set up the forum software and then you hire the mod positions.That forum last few posts seem to be AI spam as well.Do you even own this forum or are you just pretending to be the one owning it? Sign a message from that forum for your own sake if you want to prove even an ounce of legitimacy.

comments.author: joniboini
comments.body: Your forum barely has any content as it is. Why would anyone consider managing your website? I'd suggest you focus on growing it first, then you can probably look for a voluntary moderator after your forum has enough traffic. If not, then a paid position is necessary. Post it on the service board if you're serious about this and can pay with BTC, or on the altcoin boards if you want to use alts.

comments.author: Yamane_Keto
comments.body: The maximum number of views for many topics are 25 and the number of connected people is 5. I do not expect that there will be a good return from advertising, and you will have limited resources to hire a moderator.It is best to look for a team to promote the service, and if you do not have a distinguished team, it is better to sell the domain. The name sounds good and its value may be between $30 and $500.

comments.author: Cean
comments.body: lol all things aside, imagine creating your forum on obsolete SMF in year 2023.

comments.author: Die_empty
comments.body: Quote from: examplens on October 24, 2023, 10:51:06 PMQuote from: Rap111 on October 24, 2023, 02:34:07 PMRequired for Forum -- Moderator WantedGrowing Together I Decided to Put the System into OperationI assume that it is not a paid position, but you are expecting someone on a volunteer basis.Have you done any analysis at all, how much is needed for another cryptocurrency talk forum? What is the goal you want to achieve with it?Just a few days ago, you were selling this domain, what are the guarantees that you won't sell it in a few months, so someone who volunteered with you just wasted his time.Talkethereum.org domain name for saleQuote from: Rap111 on October 19, 2023, 01:25:11 PMMy Private Domain Name is For Sale You Can Contact Ushttps://t.me/ethereumtalkgroupGood question and thank you for doing more research on OP. Since it is voluntary OP has nothing to lose if finally sells it. But the website looks good (but a copycat of bitcointalk.org) and the domain name is suitable. I suggest you make it a paid Job position since he has intention to sell it. But Â a deal with some conditions can be signed and a volunteer can take the job. But it will be painful to work for free expecting to grow the business and it is finally sold and you go home with nothing.Quote from: Yamane_Keto on October 26, 2023, 08:13:50 AMThe maximum number of views for many topics is 25 and the number of connected people is 5. I do not expect that there will be a good return from advertising, and you will have limited resources to hire a moderator.It is best to look for a team to promote the service, and if you do not have a distinguished team, it is better to sell the domain. The name sounds good and its value may be between $30 and $500.If he can pay for the service, there is nothing wrong with it. Businesses grow with time and become profitable in the future. Like you said the website should be promoted to attract more viewers.

comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: Quote from: Rap111 on October 24, 2023, 02:34:07 PMhttps://talkethereum.org Â Required for Forum -- Moderator WantedGrowing Together I Decided to Put the System into OperationI don't know why you want to have moderators on a forum that has low to no traffic at all. If you want to have a paid moderators then surely you'll get a few moderators because of your this post but if you want a free moderator then I'm sorry to say but you won't get anyone from this forum who would moderate the forum for free. Let's be serious if you are really in need of a moderator then you should at least offer that moderator a salary for his hard moderation work, and that way you may get some moderators from this forum. But, still I don't think that any reputed member will trust you because your account is still a newbie rank account and that's why you should also have someone as escrow if you want to offer a position to a member of this forum.

comments.author: wallet4bitcoin
comments.body: Quote from: Rap111 on October 24, 2023, 02:34:07 PMhttps://talkethereum.org Â Required for Forum -- Moderator WantedGrowing Together I Decided to Put the System into OperationI have worked with a forum before. I remember the days I worked as a global forum moderator with taucointalk.org and we were with the project until it could no longer be funded. Do you have resources to fund the project.Â  Speaking from experience, I have much experience working as a forum moderator as I have done with with forums as well as communities but I want to know if you have enprovisioned resources to cover for it. My DM is open if you want to reachout or ask questions on how we jump-started Taucoin forum.

comments.author: JollyGood
comments.body: Quote from: Rap111 on October 24, 2023, 02:34:07 PMhttps://talkethereum.org Â Required for Forum -- Moderator WantedGrowing Together I Decided to Put the System into OperationBy default you have managed to get free publicity for your forum when you posted here. I checked, it seems like it has no traffic and just a couple of posts therefore why do you require moderators? You did not elaborate if you were going to offer pay or expected volunteers to apply.Quote from: joniboini on October 26, 2023, 02:02:34 AMYour forum barely has any content as it is. Why would anyone consider managing your website? I'd suggest you focus on growing it first, then you can probably look for a voluntary moderator after your forum has enough traffic. If not, then a paid position is necessary. Post it on the service board if you're serious about this and can pay with BTC, or on the altcoin boards if you want to use alts.Maybe he got what he was after, he has now posted the name and URL therefore he will be expecting some sort of traffic from members here. If that is the aim, he will fail because at this moment in time there is nothing of interest in that Ethereum forum.

comments.author: tabas
comments.body: @OP I agree with everyone that you don't have much visitors yet and what you need to focus for now is to increase the visits that you get. There's nothing to moderate yet on your forum and that's why if you're optimistic in increasing that, you need to do something. Basically, some other forums have already done the advertising through bitcointalk through different marketing methods like campaigns and other advertising stuff. We're just giving you the idea but if you take that as an advice, that's good for you. But if you don't take that as something helpful for the growth of your forum, that's also okay and we can't do anything about that. And I guess they're also right about you saying about "growing together" this is like a volunteer post and not paid.

comments.author: CCMS
comments.body: Quote from: examplens on October 24, 2023, 10:51:06 PMQuote from: Rap111 on October 24, 2023, 02:34:07 PMRequired for Forum -- Moderator WantedGrowing Together I Decided to Put the System into Operation...Talkethereum.org domain name for saleQuote from: Rap111 on October 19, 2023, 01:25:11 PMMy Private Domain Name is For Sale You Can Contact Ushttps://t.me/ethereumtalkgroupOp was selling few days back and now hiring mod ? What's going on ?

comments.author: johnsaributua
comments.created_time: October 27, 2023, 09:01:02 AMLast edit: October 31, 2023, 12:54:38 AM by johnsaributua
comments.body: You don't want to add this picture to make it more beautiful, sir?your initial post, selling telegram domains with the same theme and project, are you not too hasty? I'm sure you're still considering selling, right? Then thinking about hiring someone for your purpose with the simple machine forum 2023, sounds like making a pond in a pond.Â  The purpose of people in forums is also to benefit many people with knowledge and loyal activeness, and there is reciprocity from the project owner to get provisions (worthy of his work) to continue to be active, either daily survival or additional for him, of course it is balanced, right?Â  I don't find your offer for people interested, you can correct sir, your journey is still far away and prove that you are serious, it doesn't hurt while you continue to be active and synergize in bitcoin talk, in my opinion this is good and you can work on it.
